lines: 1. Xikwembu A Xi Mi Hlayise, Hosi Yi Mi Khongotela, Yi Mi Hlayisa Ndleleni,
Loko Hita Hlangana Kambe, Emahlweni Ka Xinyimpfana, Loko Hi Ta Hlangana Kambe, Hosi A Yi Mi Sirhelele.
2. Hosi A Yi Mi Sirhelele, Hosi A Yi Mi Vukarhe
Yi Mi Phamela Swakudya, Ku Kondza Hi Vonana Kambe.
3. Hosi A Yi Mi Sirhelele, Maxangwini Ya Misava,
Wa Swi Kota Ku Vukarha, Ku Kondza Hi Vonana Kambe.
4. Hosi A Yi Mi Sirhelele, Hi Rirhandzu Lerikulu,
